## CEO Salary versus Return on Equity
October 14, 2018

```{r echo = FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(plotly))

ceo_sal <- read.csv("H:/developing_data_products/ceo_sal.csv")
colnames(ceo_sal)[1] = "salary"

plot_ly(x=~salary, y=~roe, data = ceo_sal, type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers')
```
